climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Easy to Use - One Sheet for One Load. Simply drop it in the washer. No measuring, no spills, no mess, easy to use sheets that simplify your laundry routine. Our Eco sheets dissolve at any water temperature and can be used in all types of washing machines.
Deep Cleaning Power - Our laundry detergent sheets contain surfactants and enzymes which help remove various stains such as blood, coffee, oil, red wine, sweat, etc.
Sensitive Skin Friendly - Our plant-derived formula is gentle and safe for even the most sensitive skin types, making it suitable for the whole family.
Save So Much Space - Say goodbye to heavy and bulky detergent bottles and hello to lightweight and portable sheets. The compact packaging makes it perfect for travel, camping, or daily use at home.
Eco-Friendly & Zero Plastic - Our Eco sheets are made with zero plastic and are biodegradable. Freshen up your clothes guilt-free and stay kind to the planet.
Be an Eco-Hero - Add fun to your life with laundry detergent sheets, reduce carbon emissions and plastic pollution to the planet. Save the planet with small everyday actions!
body.description: Introducing our Eco-Friendly Laundry Detergent Sheets - the perfect solution for your laundry needs. Our laundry detergent sheets are not only great for you but also for the planet. Why are our Eco-Friendly Laundry Detergent Sheets great for you? Hypoallergenic: Great for your skin. Made from Natural Ingredients: Contain no phosphorus, no fluorescer, or other chemicals. Easy to Use: Simply toss a sheet into the washing machine. No measuring, no spills, no mess.Powerful and effective: Fast dissolving laundry detergent sheets for hassle-free cleaning. Why are our Eco-Friendly Laundry Detergent Sheets great for the Planet? Plastic Free: No plastic in our product or product packaging. This means no plastic will end up in our oceans or landfills. Cruelty Free and Vegan Friendly: No animal testing nor animal products in the creation of these products. Fewer carbon emissions: Our Eco-Friendly laundry detergent sheets are ultra lightweight and compact, which means less fuel used in transport, resulting in fewer CO₂ emissions.Take a step towards a more sustainable lifestyle by choosing our Eco-Friendly laundry detergent sheets. Try them today and see the difference they can make in your laundry routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Happy with my purchase
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with my purchase. Disolves completely each time. LOVE the EXTRA ROOM I have! Love the convenience, its clean - no messy cups, smells very nice. Disappointed its out of stock. I highly doubt I'll go back to those heavy jugs ever again. I have sensitive skin but not diagnosed with anything, still I'm not sensing any problems at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am sensitive to fragrance. These are very strong just opening the cabinet door where they are sitting in the box and I can't stand to touch them. The clothes get clean and they don't have much smell after washing. I will let my husband use these- stored in a sealed jar- and go back to Meliora Powder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was very skeptical about this product, but thought these sheets would work great for travel! I was pleasantly surprised when I tried them out at home. They work every bit as good as my liquid detergent, if not better! I am sold on these! After all, as they say, why pay for water!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased so far
reviews.reviewText: This was my first experience with laundry detergent sheets. I was frustrated with the amount of plastic I was throwing away, along with the mess of the heavy jugs and laundry detergent spilling.The packaging appears to be recycled cardboard, and it opens like dryer sheets. Each sheet has a perforation, so half a sheet can be used for a very small load. An average load uses 1 sheet and a giant load uses 2. The sheets smell fresh, but I don’t notice scent on my clothing once it’s washed. An added dryer sheet freshens up my towels and sheets. I don’t feel that the detergent sheet softens clothing on its own.The product seems to clean well and would be fabulous for travel. So far, I’m quite pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trying something new
reviews.reviewText: My mom told me about these. I'm such a hippie. I want less plastic coming out of my house, in general. These work great. Always put them under the water spout. I'm hooked now. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I thought
reviews.reviewText: I liked the idea of not using pods or giant plastic jugs of detergent. The box of desserts was compact and was easy to store.I was normally using a name brand pod for my laundry. Upon getting the laundry sheets I was pleasantly surprised. The scent of the sheets was fresh and I was not overwhelmed.I did a color batch and a white batch with the sheets and the pods. I saw no difference in the results. I’m a believer and will order these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The smell was a little strong for me. But didn’t notice it when i washed with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to store, use, and get the job done.
reviews.reviewText: I can't tell any difference between this product and the Gain or other pods I have used. It is undoubtedly much more convenient to store and use these, and as far as travel, hands down, this is a win.
